ygData.subject: Re: Enchanters Research components
ygData.msgSnippet: I think the second question was covered well, so I ll give some input to the first question.  I have found one word so far and that was on a named NPC orc in
ygData.messageBody:
I think the second question was covered well, so I'll give some input to the
first question. I have found one word so far and that was on a named NPC
orc in Kithikor Forest. He was about level 14 or 15. There were two named
orcs there, and one had a word on him.
I am a wizard myself so I gave the word to my enchanter friend.

-Shadowwalker of Karana

----- Original Message -----
From: <duffjc@...>
To: <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, May 07, 1999 10:48 AM
Subject: [EQ_spell_research] Enchanters Research components


> From: duffjc@...
>
> Has anyone discovered the secrets to the Enchanters research components.
Wizards have runes and necros have pages, but do enchanters have words??
>
> If so, does anyone know of these words? Has anyone found these and where
are they.
>
> #2. How do languages work. I have elder erudian, erudin and common, nut
how do you get started whith other languages. I talk to the foreegners, but
I don't get the skill to show up on my skill list? Please help
>
> Sinth the Enchanter
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Did you know that
> http://www.ONElist.com
> More than 3.5 million people are using ONElist?
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> This list is intended for the trade of Spell components for spell
research. Please keep the emails on topic.
